data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Fulham's Aleksandar Mitrovic is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 1, Graham Scott signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
Free kick for Fulham in the half of Newcastle.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
In the minute 3, In Newcastle upon Tyne, Mario Lemina of Fulham is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Graham Scott signals a throw-in for Fulham, close to Newcastle's area.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
In the minute 6, Newcastle push forward at St James' Park and Matt Ritchie gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fulham defence.
Goal kick for Newcastle at St James' Park.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
In the minute 9, Jonjo Shelvey (Newcastle) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Callum Wilson (Newcastle) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Fulham defenders.
In the minute 11, Important block from the Newcastle defence as Tom Cairney fires in a strike for Fulham.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
Fulham's Ademola Lookman goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 13, Free kick Newcastle.
Newcastle push upfield but Graham Scott quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Newcastle in the half of Fulham.
In the minute 15, In Newcastle upon Tyne Newcastle attack through Matt Ritchie. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Fulham have a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Graham Scott signals a Fulham throw-in in Newcastle's half.
Fulham to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
Joelinton's header is off-target for Newcastle.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
Can Fulham capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Fulham pushes forward through Bobby Reid, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 28, Fulham's Ademola Lookman gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Newcastle defender.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
In Newcastle upon Tyne, Tosin Adarabioyo (Fulham) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 28, Graham Scott awards Newcastle a goal kick.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
Throw-in for Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 32, Fulham's Bobby Reid gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Fulham.
Tom Cairney of Fulham gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 36, Graham Scott awards Newcastle a goal kick.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
Newcastle drives forward and Miguel Almiron gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 40, Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
Own goal! Matt Ritchie scores in his own net to make it 0-1.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second half has started at St James' Park.
In the minute 46, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Newcastle close to the penalty box.
Isaac Hayden is on a sub for Federico Fernandez for Newcastle.
Joachim Andersen (Fulham) has received a first yellow card.
Jonjo Shelvey for Newcastle gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Fulham have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 50, Tom Cairney of Fulham smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Newcastle close to the penalty box.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
In the minute 53, Fulham drive upfield and Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Newcastle defender.
Graham Scott awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 55, In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Fulham to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
In the minute 58, Goal kick for Fulham at St James' Park.
Throw-in high up the field for Fulham in Newcastle upon Tyne.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Newcastle.
In the minute 62, At St James' Park, Joachim Andersen is shown a red card and sent off.
Callum Wilson scores from the spot and Newcastle draw level at St James' Park.
In the minute 65, Ball safe as Newcastle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Michael Hector is replacing Tom Cairney for Fulham at St James' Park.
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
Free kick Newcastle.
In the minute 67, Sean Longstaff gets his shot on target but fails to score for Newcastle.
Ademola Lookman for Fulham drives towards goal at St James' Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
In the minute 69, Graham Scott signals a Fulham throw-in in Newcastle's half.
Newcastle's Joelinton gets in a shot on goal at St James' Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Fulham are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 72, Ciaran Clark is booked for the home team.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
In the minute 75, Graham Scott signals a free kick to Newcastle.
Dwight Gayle is replacing Joelinton for the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Fulham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Newcastle.
In the minute 77, Fulham make their second substitution with Ruben Loftus-Cheek replacing Aleksandar Mitrovic.
In the minute 78, Fulham's Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa breaks free at St James' Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Graham Scott awards Newcastle a goal kick.
Free kick for Newcastle in the half of Fulham.
In the minute 79, The home team replace Paul Dummett with Ryan Fraser.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Newcastle just outside Fulham's area.
Antonee Robinson for Fulham has been booked by Graham Scott and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 82, Newcastle needs to be cautious. Fulham have an attacking throw-in.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Newcastle capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fulham's half?
Newcastle are coming forward and Callum Wilson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 86, Fulham have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Fulham in the half of Newcastle.
Fulham to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
In the minute 88, Fulham needs to be cautious. Newcastle have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Newcastle in the half of Fulham.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Newcastle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
Goal kick for Fulham at St James' Park.
Throw-in for Fulham in the half of Newcastle.
Throw-in for Newcastle at St James' Park.
Graham Scott awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
The away team replace Ademola Lookman with Joe Bryan.
Michael Hector (Fulham) gets a yellow card.
